Title: PriceWatch
Description: PriceWatch is a WPF based application, which can watch the price of products in some e-commerce websites, like Amazon. You can see the price trend, and get an alert when the price is changed.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
PriceWatch is a WPF based application, which can watch the price of products in some e-commerce websites, like Amazon. You can see the price trend, and get an alert when the price is changed.
